newsitem.title: POLAND: Kruszwica revises down 1997 net forecast.
newsitem.headline: Kruszwica revises down 1997 net forecast.

text.p: Polish edible fat producer Kruszwica SA revised down its 1997 net profit forecast to 5.6 million zlotys from earlier expected 12.6 million, the company said in a statement on Monday.
It did not give any further details but last month it said it would revise its earlier forecast because a harsh winter wiped out much of Poland's rapeseed crops and drove up prices.
In 1996 Kruszwica had a net profit of 3.4 million zlotys.
